DESCRIPTION: When a Creature with [dragonmod:ScorchIcon] is attacked it takes damage equal to a quarter of their [dragonmod:ScorchIcon] and is reduced that much.
Creatures with [dragonmod:SanctifyIcon] take 25% less damage from attacks, Attackers Spend Stigmata to heal. Cure in excess of your Max HP or Stigmata becomes [dragonmod:BlockIcon.] .
Put X random cards from your draw pile into your hand, discard them after you play a card.
Increases damage dealt & Healing from #yCure.
Spend X [#94bdff]Holy[] [#94bdff]Power[] for an effect
After you Chant X times, activate the following effect. At the start of each turn, and when you take damage, #yChant ALL your Verses.
Reduce the delay of a Verse by 1. At the start of each turn, and when you take damage, #yChant ALL your Verses.
Whenever you take damage or lose HP deal damage to ALL enemies equal to your #yConfesison. NL If isn't your turn, reduce Confession by half.
When you obtain #b5 Sacrifice spend it and increase damage dealt & Healing from #yCure by #b1.
Gained whenever you lose HP. Reduced by Half at the end of your turn. Every 5 Stigmata spent by Cure Increases Damage done & Healing recieved by 1.
Spend [dragonmod:StigmataIcon] to heal. Cure in excess of your Max HP or [dragonmod:StigmataIcon] becomes [dragonmod:BlockIcon] .
The number of cards in your hand and #yHymn pile, excluding this one.
This relic only appears for slayers of Draconic Ancestry.
This card starts combat set aside.
Retrieve a random set aside #yCantrip or #ySheathed card.
Set a card aside, retrieve it later when you #yFlourish.
Move the leftmost card in your hand to the right most position.
A Bonus effect if X or more cards are to the right of this.
#yChilled creatures give #yBlock equal to their chill and lose #b1 chill when they take unblocked attack damage or are damaged by an #yIcicles.
#yOrb : Deals damage to the last enemy you attacked. After being #yEvoked, if your next orb is an #yIcicle #yEvoke it.
When an Orb is Removed from a crystal orb slot, gain #b1 Temporary Focus and lose that orb slot.
An orb channeled into a Hail orb slot in addition to its other effects deals damage to a random enemy twice. NL when an Orb is Removed from a hail orb slot lose that orb slot.
A Bonus effect if the target of this card has the listed Debuff.
Activate the passive effect of your next orb.
#yBleeding creature lose HP at the start of your turn and lose all Bleed. NL #yBleeding creatures can't act if their [dragonmod:BleedIcon] will kill them.
[dragonmod:SubzeroIcon] Increases the base damage of #yIcicles you channel by half your [dragonmod:SubzeroIcon].

Applying [dragonmod:SlowIcon] instead raises it's duration to that amount. NL [dragonmod:SlowIcon] increases incoming damage from cards and orbs by 10% for each card played this turn, [dragonmod:SlowIcon] is reduced by #b1 each turn.
#yShrouding an Orb applies additional effects to its orb slot, an orb slot may only have one additional effect at a time a Shroud is removed alongside the contained orb.

#yStance. Whenever you play an attack, deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand to a random enemy, up to 4, then reduce the maximum damage by 1. On Exit: gain 1 [dragonmod:AmethystBlossomIcon] .
#yStance. At the start of your turn, draw 2 extra cards, then reduce this amount by 1.  On Exit: gain 1 [dragonmod:AmberBlossomIcon] .
Transforms when you change stances, Amber if Dawn, Amethyst if Dusk.
[dragonmod:AmberBlossomIcon] Increases the Maximum damage of Dawn stance.
[dragonmod:AmethystBlossomIcon] Increase the cards drawn by Dusk stance.
When you obtain #b3 [dragonmod:EmeraldBlossomIcon] gain [E] .
If the last card played this turn was not an Attack gain the following ability.
Create and Exhaust a copy of a card.
Removed until the end of combat. Does #rNot go to the exhaust pile but can be viewed there.
#yConjuring a card shuffles it from the #yExhaust pile into your draw pile it gains #yExhaust and #yBanishes when it enters the #yExhaust pile.
#yVanish effects occur when a card is removed from play.
If you are in a Stance, exit it and draw a card.
